title: I have account in tw server but the help and support staff never really helps
body: is there in anyway the riot support in NA server can help with an account in taiwan server it got perma banned for using hacks and other programs to hack or something but i never did ! i played this game for 4 years and i worked hard to get from silver to gold im only gold 4 why would i use any scripting or what ever program. I spent lots of money and time and effort on this account so if there is a way please tell me if u can help me because taiwan server is really unresponsive and they never reply .... please reply! its ok if u cant help... :(

replies.body:
Unfortunately, Riot doesn't operate League of Legends on the Taiwan region. Since Garena operates and supports League on the TW region, you'll need to get back in touch with [their support team](http://support.lol.garena.com/zh_TW) if you'd like to inquire about your account.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i will ask of questions if anything comes up :) thx for the quick response though
lol riot has the worst customer support on earth.
